english.segment1: Chorus. when we don´t get what we deserve that´s a real good thing. when we get what we don´t deserve. that´s a real good thing
english.segment2: born to sin. and then get caught. all our good deeds. don´t mean squat
english.segment3: sell the Volvo. shred the Visa. send the cash to Ma Theresa. great idea. the only catch is. you don´t get saved. on merit badges
english.segment5: doctor´s coming. looking grim. "Do you have a favorite hymn?"
english.segment6: check your balance through the years. all accounts are in arrears. guilt is bitter. grace is sweet. park it here. on the mercy seat
